title: Katamarayudu teaser: Pawan Kalyan’s style and attitude are spot on
text:
Inside pics of Chiranjeevi’s daughter Srija’s wedding celebrations 
It was yesterday the makers of Katamarayudu announced that the teaser would be out at 4pm today. And finally after much delay, it’s out! Pawan Kalyan in Ajith Kumar’s role is perfect right from the word go. His style, attitude and his mannerisms are spot on, the Telugu star is clearly on fire. Shruti Haasan and the power star together are taking us back to their Gabbar Singh days. This movie is reportedly the remake of Tamil movie Veeram that starred Thala Ajith. The original had turned out a commercial success. After this powerful teaser, Will the remake turn out a winner as well? Interestingly, his brother Chiranjeevi delivered one of his career’s biggest hits with Khaidi no 150 that happened to be remake of the Tamil movie Kaththi. Now that Pawan Kalman has followed suit, let’s see how it works out for him. Expect this teaser to break some records! Don’t be surprised if #Katamarayudu is trending all day. The movie is all set for an Ugadi release on 29th March. 
In other news, Pawan Kalyan will soon begin shooting for his next film with Trivikram.Keerthy Suresh and Anu Emmanuel have been finalised for the female lead roles. Also, another veteran actress will be making a comeback to Tollywood after 9 years with this film. We are talking about Khushboo Sundar. (Also Read: Katamarayudu new poster: Pawan Kalyan’s powerful look leaves quite an impression ) 
But there’s a recent update that has called for celebration – For the first time, after all these years Chiranjeevi and Pawan Kalman are teaming up for a project. It has been confirmed by their producer in an official statement. No further details have been divulged, all we know is both brothers are on board. Fans of both stars went crazy after hearing of this announcement. This project is surely going to be one of the most talked about films. Can’t wait for more updates on this front. 
Anyway, how did you like the Katamarayudu teaser? Which was your favorite scene? Published: February 4, 2017 6:12 pm Topics:
